comments.body: Seems very reasonable to move this. I would even have been fine with everything in `daml-prim` but iirc I use `DA.Text` from `daml-stdlib`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,14 +1,25 @@
 -- Copyright (c) 2020 Digital Asset (Switzerland) GmbH and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
 -- SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0
 
+{-# LANGUAGE ImplicitParams #-}
 {-# LANGUAGE NoImplicitPrelude #-}
 module GHC.Stack.Types where
 
+import GHC.Classes ()
 import GHC.CString
 import GHC.Err
 import GHC.Tuple ()
 import GHC.Types
 
+-- | Request a CallStack.
+--
+-- Calls to functions with this constraint will be added to the callstack.
+-- You can get access to the current call stack with `callStack`.
+--
+-- Note that if the call stack is reset if any function in between does not
+-- have a `HasCallStack` constraint.
+type HasCallStack = (?callStack : CallStack)
